enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Communication Studies Majors only
title: SoC COMM_ST 294-0-20 First-Year Seminar

instructors.instructor_addr: 2240 Campus Dr. Rm 2-231 Frances Searle Building

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course examines how photojournalism shapes belief, motivates action, and constitutes identity and community in the United States and other affluent, liberal-democratic societies.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
"Vicki Goldberg, The Power of Photography: How Photographs Changed Our Lives, expanded and updated edition (Abbeville, 1991)

Robert Hariman and John Louis Lucaites, The Public Image (Chicago, 2016)

Deirdre N. McCloskey, Economical Writing, 2nd ed. (Waveland Press, 2000)

Susan Sontag, On Photography (Picador, 1977)"

subject: COMM_ST
